
Make sure that you download the following files to this directory:

    jboss-eap-7.1.0-quickstarts.zip
    jboss-eap-7.1.0.zip
    jboss-eap-7.1.2-patch.zip

These can be downloaded from https://access.redhat.com/jbossnetwork/restricted/listSoftware.html?product=appplatform&downloadType=distributions

Use your Red Hat customer service portal to access the distributions.
